name: Dyspatch
headline: Two products to help everyone email better. Dyspatch.io - Emailâ¦
description:
Dyspatch by Sendwithus is a powerful communications platform built around advanced email content management. Our platform simplifies transactional email creation with a robust API, an easy to use editor, and built-in device testing, allowing for truly collaborative email strategy and execution.

A centralized hub for email creation, approval, and publishing, our cloud-based solution empowers Product, Marketing, CRM, and Loyalty teams to efficiently build and test meaningful, dynamic communications without involving developers or deploying code. And with built-in support for 300+ locales, your teams can seamlessly manage localized content for global communications.

Easily connect your cloud email provider or customize your integration to connect to your digital messaging service. Upload your existing templates in minutes. And from there, youâre well on your way to optimizing every email you send.

###### WHY DYSPATCH?
## Spend more time on innovation and less time on implementation
![](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/innovation-icon-1.svg)
Increase engagement with our dynamic, interactive email builder, no coding skills required.
![](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/innovation-icon-2.svg)
Centralize your email production with built-in commenting and streamlined approval workflows.
![](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/innovation-icon-3.svg)
Integrate with your existing email service providers and hit “send” with confidence and ease.
### ![Email builder](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/email-builder-box-image.jpg)
### A Powerful, No-Code Email Builder
###### STREAMLINE AND SCALE
  * Create custom email templates in minutes — without writing code
  * Get peace of mind with default mobile responsiveness
  * Explore flexible integrations with one or multiple ESPs


[Learn more](https://www.dyspatch.io/</no-code-email-builder/>)
### ![Amp for email sample images](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/img-amp-email-home-cat.png)
### Apps in Email: AMP Made Easy
###### INNOVATE AND GROW
  * Deliver live, dynamic, and interactive email content
  * Remove friction points and create winning inbox experiences
  * Empower in-email actions to boost engagement and conversions


[Learn more](https://www.dyspatch.io/</amp-for-email/>)
###### EASILY INTEGRATE WITH YOUR EXISTING ESP OR CRM

###### ABOUT DYSPATCH
## Your partner for growth
Dyspatch is a leading solution for email production and management. But we’re so much more than that. Our team of #emailgeeks has over seven years experience helping major brands get higher engagement and ROI from email. We believe in email excellence, and we're here to help you get ahead and grow.
[Discover our story](https://www.dyspatch.io/</about/>)

“Dyspatch is the perfect solution to manage the email building and template creation process. Combined with Braze, it creates a holistic workflow for localizations and scaling our email channel.”

**Dave Greenstein,** Chief Architect and Head of Growth at Urbandoor
![Canva Logo](https://www.dyspatch.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/canva-logo.png)
"Dyspatch has massively reduced the hours our team spends on creating emails, which has allowed us to really scale our content production. We're producing over 20 emails a week, and the platform ensures every single one is on-brand, localized, and responsive, without any engineering effort. It's also allowed us to implement interactivity with AMP comment reply emails. The Dyspatch team was so supportive and collaborative on that project, and it's been a huge success with our users."
**Megan Walsh,** Global Head of Lifecycle Marketing at Canva

## Have more questions about Dyspatch's interactive email builder?
We have answers! Read on for a quick overview of Dyspatch’s email builder software, and what it can do for you.
What else can I do with Dyspatch’s email builder software? 
Dyspatch is more than just email builder software. First off, you get a custom [modular design system](https://www.dyspatch.io/<https:/www.dyspatch.io/platform/email-builder/>). Fully customizable, on-brand modules make it easy to create templates quickly and efficiently. You also get access to our library of pre-coded interactive [Apps in Email](https://www.dyspatch.io/<https:/www.dyspatch.io/platform/amp-for-email/>). Powered by AMP for Email, these apps can 5x engagement. And Dyspatch serves as a centralized hub for email production. Think of it as a content management system for both your transactional and marketing email campaigns. Workspaces, themes and blocks, and an image library help you stay organized, while annotated comments and built-in approval workflows streamline collaboration. You in?
Think of it as a centralized hub for your email production. With built-in commenting, permission levels, and approval workflows, Dyspatch makes collaboration easy. By tracking feedback in one place and providing total transparency, Dyspatch streamlines the entire email creation process.
How does Dyspatch’s visual email editor work? 
Dyspatch is an industry-leading solution for email production and management. With Dyspatch, you can build engaging, interactive emails, without having to write code. By leveraging a custom modular email design system, non-technical teams can deploy beautiful, on-brand campaigns faster and achieve greater operational efficiency.
Think of it as a centralized hub for your email production. With built-in commenting, permission levels, and approval workflows, Dyspatch makes collaboration easy. By tracking feedback in one place and providing total transparency, Dyspatch streamlines the entire email creation process.
Dyspatch leverages a unique modular design system. Rather than just templates, which can be rigid and stifle your team’s creativity, these modules are fully customizable and reusable. This system gives you the flexibility to pull modules into any template, while staying on theme and on brand. If you need a new module, it’s easy to build one yourself, or let our #emailgeeks lend a hand!
How can I know if Dyspatch’s email builder software is right for me? 
Dyspatch has a lot to offer, but whether it’s right for you will depend on your needs. When choosing an email builder solution, one approach is to consider the problem you’re trying to solve. Do you struggle with broken emails? Is your time to market on email campaigns painfully slow? Are there inefficiencies in your email workflow that lead to mistakes and lost revenue? Do you need a solution to streamline and scale your email localizations? Are you looking for a platform that gives you more flexibility and freedom to innovate? If any of these problems resonate with you, then yes, Dyspatch is a great choice. 
How much does the Dyspatch email builder cost? 
It varies! We offer [monthly or annual pricing plans](https://www.dyspatch.io/<https:/www.dyspatch.io/pricing/>) for teams of all sizes. If you go with an annual plan, you get an additional 10% off. All plans include integrated Litmus testing, annotated comments and approval workflows, and access to our interactive email builder, featuring a library of pre-coded AMP email apps.

## Have more questions about Dyspatch's interactive email builder?
We have answers! Read on for a quick overview of Dyspatch’s email builder software, and what it can do for you.
What else can I do with Dyspatch’s email builder software? 
Dyspatch is more than just email builder software. First off, you get a custom modular design system⟨71⟩. Fully customizable, on-brand modules make it easy to create templates quickly and efficiently. You also get access to our library of pre-coded interactive Apps in Email⟨72⟩. Powered by AMP for Email, these apps can 5x engagement. And Dyspatch serves as a centralized hub for email production. Think of it as a content management system for both your transactional and marketing email campaigns. Workspaces, themes and blocks, and an image library help you stay organized, while annotated comments and built-in approval workflows streamline collaboration. You in?
Think of it as a centralized hub for your email production. With built-in commenting, permission levels, and approval workflows, Dyspatch makes collaboration easy. By tracking feedback in one place and providing total transparency, Dyspatch streamlines the entire email creation process.
How does Dyspatch’s visual email editor work? 
Dyspatch is an industry-leading solution for email production and management. With Dyspatch, you can build engaging, interactive emails, without having to write code. By leveraging a custom modular email design system, non-technical teams can deploy beautiful, on-brand campaigns faster and achieve greater operational efficiency.
Think of it as a centralized hub for your email production. With built-in commenting, permission levels, and approval workflows, Dyspatch makes collaboration easy. By tracking feedback in one place and providing total transparency, Dyspatch streamlines the entire email creation process.
Dyspatch leverages a unique modular design system. Rather than just templates, which can be rigid and stifle your team’s creativity, these modules are fully customizable and reusable. This system gives you the flexibility to pull modules into any template, while staying on theme and on brand. If you need a new module, it’s easy to build one yourself, or let our #emailgeeks lend a hand!
How can I know if Dyspatch’s email builder software is right for me? 
Dyspatch has a lot to offer, but whether it’s right for you will depend on your needs. When choosing an email builder solution, one approach is to consider the problem you’re trying to solve. Do you struggle with broken emails? Is your time to market on email campaigns painfully slow? Are there inefficiencies in your email workflow that lead to mistakes and lost revenue? Do you need a solution to streamline and scale your email localizations? Are you looking for a platform that gives you more flexibility and freedom to innovate? If any of these problems resonate with you, then yes, Dyspatch is a great choice. 
How much does the Dyspatch email builder cost? 
It varies! We offer monthly or annual pricing plans⟨73⟩ for teams of all sizes. If you go with an annual plan, you get an additional 10% off. All plans include integrated Litmus testing, annotated comments and approval workflows, and access to our interactive email builder, featuring a library of pre-coded AMP email apps.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Dyspatch**

Dyspatch is a SaaS company based in Victoria, Canada, that aims to revolutionize how businesses communicate via email. Their mission is simple yet impactful: to help everyone email better. Founded as Dyspatch by Sendwithus and part of Y Combinator Batch W14, Dyspatch is a powerful communications platform designed around advanced email content management.

### What They Do

At its core, Dyspatch provides a centralized hub for email creation, approval, and publishing. Whether you're in Product, Marketing, CRM, or Loyalty teams, their cloud-based platform allows you to build and test tailored communications without coding. Think of it as giving non-technical teams the tools to craft sophisticated, dynamic emails that drive engagement. With support for 300+ locales, you can manage global communications effortlessly.

Key features include:

- **No-Code Email Builder:** No need for coding skills to create engaging emails.
- **Email Collaboration Tools:** Get teams aligned with built-in commenting and approval workflows.
- **Template Localization:** Easily customize emails for different regions and languages.
- **AMP for Email:** Create interactive email experiences that engage users in real time.

### Impact

Dyspatch boasts impressive stats: they claim to reduce engineering resources by 95%, boost email conversions by 300%, and increase email engagement by a staggering 500%. Trusted by major brands like Canva, BMO, and Postmates, their platform is positioned as a go-to solution for companies looking to streamline their email communications while improving their overall marketing strategy.

### Team and Growth

With a team of around 20 employees, Dyspatch is small but nimble. Their approach focuses on innovation and strong customer support. The enthusiasm within their team of #emailgeeks stems from a deep commitment to email excellence, helping brands achieve higher engagement and ROI.

### Why Choose Dyspatch?

If your organization struggles with slow email production, broken templates, or complex localization processes, Dyspatch could be a game-changer. Their modular design system offers flexibility, allowing you to quickly adapt and innovate without getting bogged down by development cycles.

### Conclusion

In a world where communication is key, Dyspatch stands out as a leading player that empowers businesses to optimize their email strategies. Their user-friendly platform, coupled with insightful support, makes them a valuable partner for any enterprise looking to elevate its email game. For more information, check out their [website](https://www.dyspatch.io).

This blend of utility and innovation makes Dyspatch not just another email tool; it’s a comprehensive solution for brands keen on staying ahead in digital communications.
